body_html:
Same problem when running dynamic_rnn with complex hidden states.

  File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gradients.py", line 264, in _VerifyGeneratedGradients
    dtypes.as_dtype(inp.dtype).name))
ValueError: Gradient type float32 generated for op name: "RNN/while/Switch_2"
op: "Switch"
input: "RNN/while/Merge_2"
input: "RNN/while/LoopCond"
attr {
  key: "T"
  value {
    type: DT_COMPLEX64
  }
}
attr {
  key: "_class"
  value {
    list {
      s: "loc:@RNN/while/Merge_2"
    }
  }
}
 does not match input type complex64
